title: Hewlett-Packard KeyView IDOL HTML Parsing Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Hewlett-Packard KeyView IDOL. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
The flaw exists within the handling of HTML files. It is possible to trigger a buffer overflow handling table data within an HTML file. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code under the context of the process.
addtionnal_details: Hewlett-Packard has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://h20564.www2.hpe.com/portal/site/hpsc/public/kb/docDisplay/?docId=emr_na-c04771027
timeline:
2015-05-19 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2015-08-24 - Coordinated public release of advisory
